{"name": "Richland Road Church of Christ", "alternate_name": "", "description": "PARKING LOT OPENS AT 8 AM AND DOORS WILL OPEN AT 9:00 AM
200 FAMILIES CAN BE SERVED ON A FIRST COME FIRST SERVE BASIS
 AS OF MARCH 1, 2020 EACH HOUSEHOLD IS ONLY ALLOWED 1 PROXY. 
ID IS REQUIRED
AS YOU ENTER THE PARKING LOT YOU WILL BE GIVEN A NUMBER
1 INDIVIDUAL PER VEHICLE/HOUSEHOLD WILL BE ALLOWED TO ENTER THE BUILDING WHEN YOUR NUMBER IS UP", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "535 Richland Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Marion", "state_province": "OH", "postal_code": "43302", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.5748194, "longitude": -83.0979936}, "phones": [{"number": "(740) 389-1017", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}]}
